name: Slap Shot (itch)
description:
Slap Shot is a school assignment turned side project. It is a isometric hockey game about navigating obstetrical to get to the net. The main menu must be controlled by the mouse and the wrest of the game by controller (I am working on a patch so the controller works on the main menu and keyboard in game).

Their are currently only 3 levels in the game but I am planning on adding more along with more polish to textures.
